dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT s.shipment_xid, sref1.shipment_refnum_value commodity, loc1.location_name customer_name, con1.contact_xid customer_code, l1.location_name discharge_port, l2.location_name destination_location, cv.charter_voyage_xid booking_number, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') sail_date, TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value) vessel_voyage, cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value ship_line, l3.location_name servprov_name, TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')) || ' MT' quantity, TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')) || ' X ' || TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'999,999')) || '''' container_count, (CASE WHEN s.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,s.dest_location_gid), 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') END) eta, sref2.shipment_refnum_value bol_number, sref3.shipment_refnum_value freight_rate, l4.location_name load_port, TO_CHAR(s.sail_date + 21, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') sales_due_date FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON s.shipment_gid = srn.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COST PER CONTAINER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON cv.dest_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l3 ON cv.servprov_gid = l3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l4 ON cv.source_location_gid = l4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_REMARKS' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT s.shipment_xid, NVL(sref1.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') commodity, NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') customer_name, NVL(con1.contact_xid, 'Data Missing in System') customer_code, NVL(l1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') discharge_port, NVL(l2.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') destination_location, NVL(cv.charter_voyage_xid, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') sail_date, NVL(TRIM(cv.voyage_name || ' ' || cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') vessel_voyage, NVL(cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') ship_line, NVL(l3.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') servprov_name, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(ROUND(s.total_net_weight_base / 2204.5855379,3), '999,999,990.000')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' MT' quantity, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopdd JOIN s_ship_unit sunit ON sstopdd.s_ship_unit_gid = sunit.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT sunit.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopdd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopdd.stop_num = 1), '999,999,999')), 'Data Missing in System') || ' X ' || NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR( (SELECT ssu.received_ship_unit_count FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1),'999,999')) || '''', 'Data Missing in System') container_count, NVL((CASE WHEN s.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(cv.arrival_date, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(cv.arrival_date,s.dest_location_gid), 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY') END), 'Data Missing in System') eta, NVL(sref2.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') bol_number, NVL(sref3.shipment_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') freight_rate, NVL(l4.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') load_port, NVL(TO_CHAR(s.sail_date + 21, 'fmMONTH DD, YYYY'), 'Data Missing in System') sales_due_date FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum srn ON s.shipment_gid = srn.shipment_gid AND srn.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || srn.shipment_refnum_value LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip1 ON s.shipment_gid = sip1.shipment_gid AND sip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON sip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.BILL OF LADING NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON s.shipment_gid = sref3.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COST PER CONTAINER' LEFT OUTER JOIN location l1 ON s.port_of_load_location_gid = l1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l2 ON cv.dest_location_gid = l2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l3 ON cv.servprov_gid = l3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location l4 ON cv.source_location_gid = l4.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr1 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr1.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr1.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_VOYAGE_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN charter_voyage_refnum cvr2 ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = cvr2.charter_voyage_gid AND cvr2.charter_voyage_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.CHARVOY_REMARKS' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN loc1.location_name ELSE NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') END) sales_broker_name, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oob.order_base_xid ELSE NVL(oob.order_base_xid, 'Data Missing in System') END) sales_contract_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oref1.ob_refnum_value ELSE NVL(oref1.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') END) customer_broker_id, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN iterm.inco_term_xid || ' ' || oob.term_location_text ELSE NVL(TRIM(iterm.inco_term_xid || ' ' || oob.term_location_text), 'Data Missing in System') END) sales_inco_term, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oref2.ob_refnum_value ELSE NVL(oref2.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') END) sales_payment_terms, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obr1.remark_text ELSE NVL(obr1.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) sales_lc_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN obr2.remark_text ELSE NVL(obr2.remark_text, 'Data Missing in System') END) latest_ship_date FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party oip ON oob.order_base_gid = oip.order_base_gid AND oip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BROKER ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON oip.involved_party_contact_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.SHIPPER_PURCHASE_ORDER_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CUST PAYTERMS' LEFT OUTER JOIN inco_term iterm ON oob.inco_term_gid = iterm.inco_term_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr1 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr1.order_base_gid AND obr1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LETTER OF CREDIT NUM' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_remark obr2 ON oob.order_base_gid = obr2.order_base_gid AND obr2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_PAYTERM_LAST SHIP DATE' WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'Data Missing in System' sales_broker_name, 'Data Missing in System' sales_contract_number, 'Data Missing in System' customer_broker_id, 'Data Missing in System' sales_inco_term, 'Data Missing in System' sales_payment_terms, 'Data Missing in System' sales_lc_number, 'Data Missing in System' last_ship_date FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT s.shipment_gid FROM shipment s LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid WHERE s.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID AND NOT sessuj.s_equipment_gid IS NULL)

SELECT (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN loc1.location_name ELSE NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') END) supplier_name, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN con1.contact_xid ELSE NVL(con1.contact_xid, 'Data Missing in System') END) supplier_id, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN loc2.location_name ELSE NVL(loc2.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') END) purch_broker_name, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oob.order_base_xid ELSE NVL(oob.order_base_xid, 'Data Missing in System') END) purch_contract_number, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oref1.ob_refnum_value ELSE NVL(oref1.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') END) supplier_broker_id, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN iterm.inco_term_xid || ' ' || oob.term_location_text ELSE NVL(TRIM(iterm.inco_term_xid || ' ' || oob.term_location_text), 'Data Missing in System') END) purch_inco_term, (CASE WHEN :P_RUN = 'FINAL' THEN oref2.ob_refnum_value ELSE NVL(oref2.ob_refnum_value, 'Data Missing in System') END) purch_payment_terms FROM ob_order_base oob LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party oip1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oip1.order_base_gid AND oip1.involved_party_qual_gid = 'CUSTOMER' LEFT OUTER JOIN contact con1 ON oip1.involved_party_contact_gid = con1.contact_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON con1.location_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_involved_party oip2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oip2.order_base_gid AND oip2.involved_party_qual_gid = 'BROKER ID' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON oip2.involved_party_contact_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref1 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref1.order_base_gid AND oref1.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.SHIPPER_PURCHASE_ORDER_NUMBER' LEFT OUTER JOIN ob_refnum oref2 ON oob.order_base_gid = oref2.order_base_gid AND oref2.ob_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.BCO_OB PAYTERM_CUST PAYTERMS' LEFT OUTER JOIN inco_term iterm ON oob.inco_term_gid = iterm.inco_term_gid WHERE oob.order_base_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID' AND ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Data Missing in System' supplier_name, 'Data Missing in System' supplier_id, 'Data Missing in System' purch_broker_name, 'Data Missing in System' purch_contract_number, 'Data Missing in System' purch_broker_id, 'Data Missing in System' purch_inco_term, 'Data Missing in System' purch_payment_terms FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT oob.order_base_gid FROM ob_order_base oob WHERE oob.order_base_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || (SELECT ssur.refnum_value FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.MATCHED_PO_ID' AND ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = (SELECT ssd.s_ship_unit_gid FROM shipment_stop_d ssd WHERE ROWNUM = 1 AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.shipment_gid = :SHIPMENT_ID)))
